name: Justin
text: I just got in! Got it? Cause I'm Justin! Just-in! hehe

name: Justin
text: I once wanted to be an adventurer like you, but I got an arrow in my knee...

name: Justin
text: You look tired, want some Monster Energy Drink? It's ZERO sugar.

name: Justin
text: I would love a sandwich right now...

name: Justin
text: What? Who goes there? Hm... must have been a wind.
